description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，爱新觉罗·胤祥第七子，第二任怡亲王。他也是一位著名的藏书家和诗人。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the seventh son of Yinxiang, and the second Prince Yi. He was also a renowned book collector and poet.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，康熙帝第十三子，雍正帝的异母弟，第一代怡亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the 13th son of the Kangxi Emperor, half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor, and the first Prince Yi.

zh-cn: 怡贤亲王嫡福晋兆佳氏

description.zh-cn: 怡贤亲王胤祥的嫡福晋，弘晓之母。
description.en: The primary consort of Prince Yi (Yinxiang) and the mother of Hongxiao.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，弘晓次子，第三代怡亲王。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the second son of Hongxiao, and the third Prince Yi.

description.zh-cn: 清朝世袭亲王爵位，始封于怡贤亲王胤祥。
description.en: A hereditary princely peerage of the Qing dynasty, first created for Prince Yixian, Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝，胤祥的异母兄。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty, half-brother of Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝，雍正帝第四子。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty, the fourth son of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清代八旗之一。
description.en: One of the Eight Banners of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，康熙帝第二十一子，封慎靖郡王。与弘晓有诗歌往来。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, the 21st son of the Kangxi Emperor, created Prince Shenjing of the Second Rank. He exchanged poetry with Hongxiao.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，康熙帝之孙，雍正帝养子，封果恭郡王。与弘晓有诗歌往来。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan, grandson of the Kangxi Emperor, adopted son of the Yongzheng Emperor, created Prince Guogong of the Second Rank. He exchanged poetry with Hongxiao.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，镶红旗人，努尔哈赤的后代。与弘晓有诗歌往来。
description.en: A member of the Qing imperial clan from the Bordered Red Banner, a descendant of Nurhaci. He exchanged poetry with Hongxiao.

description.zh-cn: 中国古典长篇章回小说，又名《红楼梦》。弘晓曾收藏其早期手抄本之一的“己卯本”。
description.en: A classical Chinese novel, also known as 'Dream of the Red Chamber'. Hongxiao was a collector of one of its early manuscripts, the 'Jimao manuscript'.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓的胞兄，胤祥之子，被追封为贝勒。
description.en: The full brother of Hongxiao, son of Yinxiang, posthumously created a beile (prince of the third rank).

description.zh-cn: 弘晓的胞兄，胤祥之子，曾为贝勒但后被革爵。
description.en: The full brother of Hongxiao, son of Yinxiang, who was a beile but was later stripped of his title.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓的胞兄，胤祥之子，封宁良郡王。
description.en: The full brother of Hongxiao, son of Yinxiang, created Prince Ningliang of the Second Rank.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓是怡贤亲王胤祥的第七子。
description.en: Hongxiao was the seventh son of Prince Yixian, Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓的母亲是胤祥的嫡福晋兆佳氏。
description.en: Hongxiao's mother was Yinxiang's primary consort, Lady Zhaojia.

description.zh-cn: 兆佳氏是怡贤亲王胤祥的嫡福晋。
description.en: Lady Zhaojia was the primary consort of Prince Yixian, Yinxiang.

description.zh-cn: 永琅是弘晓的次子。
description.en: Yonglang was the second son of Hongxiao.

description.zh-cn: 弘暾是弘晓的胞兄。
description.en: Hongtun was the full brother of Hongxiao.

description.zh-cn: 弘昌是弘晓的胞兄。
description.en: Hongchang was the full brother of Hongxiao.

description.zh-cn: 弘晈是弘晓的胞兄。
description.en: Hongjiao was the full brother of Hongxiao.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥是第一代怡亲王。
description.en: Yinxiang was the first-generation Prince Yi.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓于1730年承袭其父的怡亲王爵位。
description.en: Hongxiao inherited his father's title of Prince Yi in 1730.

description.zh-cn: 永琅于1778年承袭其父的怡亲王爵位。
description.en: Yonglang inherited his father's title of Prince Yi in 1778.

description.zh-cn: 胤祥于雍正八年（1730年）逝世，由其子弘晓承袭怡亲王爵位。
description.en: Yinxiang passed away in 1730, and his title of Prince Yi was inherited by his son Hongxiao.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓于乾隆四十三年（1778年）逝世，由其次子永琅承袭怡亲王爵位。
description.en: Hongxiao passed away in 1778, and his title of Prince Yi was inherited by his second son Yonglang.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓在乾隆年间曾担任正白旗汉军都统等职务。
description.en: Hongxiao served in positions such as Commander of the Plain White Banner Han Martial during the Qianlong era.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓于乾隆五年至八年（1740-1743）担任正白旗汉军都统。
description.en: Hongxiao served as the Commander of the Plain White Banner Han Martial from 1740 to 1743 (the 5th to 8th year of the Qianlong reign).

description.zh-cn: 弘晓与慎靖郡王允禧有诗歌往来。
description.en: Hongxiao exchanged poetry with Prince Shenjing of the Second Rank, Yunxi.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓与果恭郡王弘瞻有诗歌往来。
description.en: Hongxiao exchanged poetry with Prince Guogong of the Second Rank, Hongzhan.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓与宗室敦诚有诗歌往来。
description.en: Hongxiao exchanged poetry with the imperial clansman Duncheng.

description.zh-cn: 弘晓曾收藏《石头记》的早期手抄本“己卯本”，该版本因藏于其怡亲王府而被称为“怡府本”，对《红楼梦》的版本流传和研究具有重要价值。
description.en: Hongxiao collected an early manuscript of 'The Story of the Stone' known as the 'Jimao manuscript'. Because it was kept in his Prince Yi Mansion, it is also called the 'Yifu manuscript', which is of great importance to the transmission and study of 'Dream of the Red Chamber'.
